creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: planes of color; embossed lines (rock garden) in foreground with grass and bushes beyond; dark blue calm water in middle ground; rocks and foliage at far bank at top of image
inscription: Left, embossed: 一九六三年作天龍寺の庭 {1963nen saku, Tenryū-ji no niwa}; bottom, in pencil: Tenryuji Garden
markings: LRC red artist\'s seal: 吉田 {Yoshida}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper with embossing
title: Tenryūji Garden
